title: ch3ering
author: ch3ering
content: Hi there, I have some interesting stuff related to the crypto world but am not a native English speaker. I'm looking for someone who can help operate a twitter account.Cheers

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: You have got to share more details.What are you offering the person going to have a partnership with you?I think the board you are looking for is either Marketplace (Altcoins) or Services depending on whether you are going to offer them altcoins or Bitcoins.Move the thread over to those boards.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Are you just looking for someone that will help you run it without any payment or it's a paid task that you're offering?If this is all about content creation and you'll have to post it on a project's Twitter account and you're worrying that you're not a native speaker. You can give it a try. Many social media managers aren't even native speakers but they've studied the language very well. As long as your content is natural and caters to organic engagement to the followers, that's what will matter.

comments.author: dravenbtc
comments.body: Quote from: ch3ering on February 07, 2023, 07:59:18 PMHi there, I have some interesting stuff related to the crypto world but am not a native English speaker. I'm looking for someone who can help operate a twitter account.CheersI often comments on tt various events, of course crypto the most but also other things, more information?

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: I'll be happy to work with you. Let's discuss on TG: @Prowriterteam

comments.author: aseev
comments.body: Let me know if you need any kind of graphics for your social media. Examples and info are in this thread - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5438309.msg61716128
